name: Brew Breaker
description:
Play as Agnes the Witch in a brick breaking adventure, collecting ingredients and brewing potions using the Fiendish Cauldron.

~~~~~

Move - Arrow Keys
Wand/Confirm - Space

Hitting the ball with your wand will magick the ball, causing it to destroy the block it hits, and magicking further adjacent blocks. Any magicked blocks will drop ingredients, which can either be collected for points, or dropped into the Fiendish Cauldron to complete potion recipes (the current recipe is shown on the right!)

~~~~~

Brew Breaker is a game made in 31 days for #devtober. As part of the #devtober challenge, there is a goal of making at least $1 from the game. If you enjoyed the game, please consider donating a dollar. or check out my Patreon to further support. 
If you're not in a position to pay, no big deal. This one's on me!
